arg.jname: ボタン名 (日本語、省略可)

arg.jname: ボタン名 (日本語、省略可)

arg.name: arg 1
arg.jname: ボタン名 (日本語、省略可)

params.sqlcmd: "select " +" V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"ITEM_CD\\" as \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"ITEM_NAME\\" as \\"ITEM_NAME\\", " +" FNCGETFORMATTEDDATETIME(V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"ODR_START_DATE\\") as \\"ODR_START_DATE\\", " +" FNCGETFORMATTEDDATETIME(V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"PRD_START_DATE\\") as \\"PRD_START_DATE\\", " +" FNCGETFORMATTEDDATETIME(V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"PRD_DUE_DATE\\") as \\"PRD_DUE_DATE\\", " +" FNCGETFORMATTEDDATETIME(V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"DUE_DATE\\") as \\"DUE_DATE\\", " +" TO_CHAR(V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"ODR_QTY\\", 'FM999999999999999990.0999') as \\"ODR_QTY\\", " +" TO_CHAR(V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"TOTAL_RCV_QTY\\", 'FM999999999999999990.0999') as \\"TOTAL_RCV_QTY\\", " +" FNCGETFORMATTEDDATETIME(V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"RCV_CMPLT_DATE\\") as \\"RCV_CMPLT_DATE\\", " +" TO_CHAR(V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"DM_QTY\\", 'FM999999999999999990.0999') as \\"DM_QTY\\", " +" TO_CHAR(V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"TOTAL_ISSUE_QTY\\", 'FM999999999999999990.0999') as \\"TOTAL_ISSUE_QTY\\", " +" FNCGETFORMATTEDDATETIME(V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"ISSUE_CMPLT_DATE\\") as \\"ISSUE_CMPLT_DATE\\", " +" TO_CHAR(V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"ALCD_QTY\\", 'FM999999999999999990.0999') as \\"ALCD_QTY\\", " +" V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"OD_NO\\" as \\"OD_NO\\", " +" V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"OPR_RSLT_TYP\\" as \\"OPR_RSLT_TYP\\", " +" V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"PARENT_OD_NO\\" as \\"PARENT_OD_NO\\", " +" V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"OD_GNR_TYP\\" as \\"OD_GNR_TYP\\", " +" V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"ODR_STS_TYP\\" as \\"ODR_STS_TYP\\", " +" V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"DM_STS_TYP\\" as \\"DM_STS_TYP\\", " +" V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"RLSD_PUCH_ODR_QTY\\" as \\"RLSD_PUCH_ODR_QTY\\", " +" V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"WORK_IN_PROC_QTY\\" as \\"WORK_IN_PROC_QTY\\", " +" V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"OUTSIDE_TYP\\" as \\"OUTSIDE_TYP\\", " +" V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"MRP_TYP\\" as \\"MRP_TYP\\", " +" V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"MRP_ODR_TYP\\" as \\"MRP_ODR_TYP\\", " +" FNCGETFORMATTEDDATETIME(V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"BUSINESS_OPR_DATE\\") as \\"BUSINESS_OPR_DATE\\", " +" V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"PLANT_CD\\" as \\"PLANT_CD\\", " +" V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"STOCK_UNIT\\" as \\"STOCK_UNIT\\" " +"from " +" V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST " +"where " +" V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" = ? " +" and V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"JOB_ODR_CANCEL_NO\\" = ? " +" and V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" and V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"OD_NO\\" = ? " +" and V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"PARENT_OD_NO\\" = ? " +" and V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" and ROWNUM <= TO_NUMBER(?) + 1 " +"order by " +" V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"ITEM_CD\\""

"select " +" T_JOB_ODR.\\"ITEM_CD\\" as \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" T_JOB_ODR.\\"JOB_ODR_TYP\\" as \\"JOB_ODR_TYP\\", " +" T_JOB_ODR.\\"ALC_GRP_CD\\" as \\"ALC_GRP_CD\\", " +" T_JOB_ODR.\\"JOB_ODR_STS_TYP\\" as \\"JOB_ODR_STS_TYP\\", " +" T_JOB_ODR.\\"JOB_ODR_DEL_FLG\\" as \\"JOB_ODR_DEL_FLG\\", " +" T_JOB_ODR.\\"PLANT_CD\\" as \\"PLANT_CD\\" " +"from " +" T_JOB_ODR " +"where " +" T_JOB_ODR.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_JOB_ODR.\\"JOB_ODR_CANCEL_NO\\" = ? " +" and T_JOB_ODR.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ?"

"select " +" V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"ITEM_CD\\" as \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"ITEM_NAME\\" as \\"ITEM_NAME\\", " +" FNCGETFORMATTEDDATETIME(V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"ODR_START_DATE\\") as \\"ODR_START_DATE\\", " +" FNCGETFORMATTEDDATETIME(V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"PRD_START_DATE\\") as \\"PRD_START_DATE\\", " +" FNCGETFORMATTEDDATETIME(V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"PRD_DUE_DATE\\") as \\"PRD_DUE_DATE\\", " +" FNCGETFORMATTEDDATETIME(V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"DUE_DATE\\") as \\"DUE_DATE\\", " +" TO_CHAR(V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"ODR_QTY\\", 'FM999999999999999990.0999') as \\"ODR_QTY\\", " +" TO_CHAR(V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"TOTAL_RCV_QTY\\", 'FM999999999999999990.0999') as \\"TOTAL_RCV_QTY\\", " +" FNCGETFORMATTEDDATETIME(V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"RCV_CMPLT_DATE\\") as \\"RCV_CMPLT_DATE\\", " +" TO_CHAR(V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"DM_QTY\\", 'FM999999999999999990.0999') as \\"DM_QTY\\", " +" TO_CHAR(V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"TOTAL_ISSUE_QTY\\", 'FM999999999999999990.0999') as \\"TOTAL_ISSUE_QTY\\", " +" FNCGETFORMATTEDDATETIME(V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"ISSUE_CMPLT_DATE\\") as \\"ISSUE_CMPLT_DATE\\", " +" TO_CHAR(V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"ALCD_QTY\\", 'FM999999999999999990.0999') as \\"ALCD_QTY\\", " +" V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"OD_NO\\" as \\"OD_NO\\", " +" V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"OPR_RSLT_TYP\\" as \\"OPR_RSLT_TYP\\", " +" V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"PARENT_OD_NO\\" as \\"PARENT_OD_NO\\", " +" V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"OD_GNR_TYP\\" as \\"OD_GNR_TYP\\", " +" V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"ODR_STS_TYP\\" as \\"ODR_STS_TYP\\", " +" V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"DM_STS_TYP\\" as \\"DM_STS_TYP\\", " +" V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"RLSD_PUCH_ODR_QTY\\" as \\"RLSD_PUCH_ODR_QTY\\", " +" V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"WORK_IN_PROC_QTY\\" as \\"WORK_IN_PROC_QTY\\", " +" V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"OUTSIDE_TYP\\" as \\"OUTSIDE_TYP\\", " +" V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"MRP_TYP\\" as \\"MRP_TYP\\", " +" V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"MRP_ODR_TYP\\" as \\"MRP_ODR_TYP\\", " +" V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"PLANT_CD\\" as \\"PLANT_CD\\", " +" FNCGETFORMATTEDDATETIME(V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"BUSINESS_OPR_DATE\\") as \\"BUSINESS_OPR_DATE\\", " +" V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"STOCK_UNIT\\" as \\"STOCK_UNIT\\" " +"from " +" V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST " +"where " +" V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" = ? " +" and V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"JOB_ODR_CANCEL_NO\\" = ? " +" and V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"PARENT_OD_NO\\" is NULL " +" and V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" and ROWNUM <= TO_NUMBER(?) + 1 " +"order by " +" V_JOB_ODR_PROG_LST.\\"ITEM_CD\\""

"select " +" FNCGETFORMATTEDDATETIME(T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.CONFIRM_DLV_DATE) CONFIRM_DLV_DATE " +"From " +" T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR " +"Where " +" T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.OD_NO = ? " +"Order by " +" T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.CONFIRM_DLV_DATE DESC"
